transcript: my work time we're going so I actually don't use it all the time it's only if I'm like struggling to focus it's more during the week because people ping me I'll just set my timer for really how long I think Something's Gonna Take and then I'll hit it and then whenever I reach I just look at how much time is left I'll just wait till the thing is over and it keeps me on it and I just keep it right like in plain sight interesting combo is if you go headphones earmuffs and caffeine and a timer I've yet to find like a better combination of productivity
